sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROE the ſeed or ſpawn of ſiſh. That of the male fiſhes is uſually diſtinguiſhed by the name of ſoft roe, or milt ; and that of the female, hard roe, or ſpawn. So inconceivably numerous are theſe ovula or ſmall eggs, that M. Petit found 342,144 of them in a carp of 18 inches ; but M. Lieuwenhoek found in a carp no more than 211,629. This laſt gentleman obſerves, that there are four times this number in a cod ; and that a common one contains 9,344,000 eggs.
